categories: Category:Imperial Navy admirals of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Malvor was an individual that served in the Galactic Empire's Imperial Navy and Imperial Officer Corps as an admiral. In the weeks after the death of Emperor Palpatine at the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY, a male Imperial who had witnessed one of Palpatine's sentinels deliver orders for Operation: Cinder to start advised one of his female colleagues to seek new orders from Admiral Malvor or Moff Senchiko, being unsure whether either were alive, rather than learn about the operation.
Malvor was mentioned in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
